channel.title: inMulti error (fixed can remove)
channel.description:
The Fix: (forgot to add the coordinates in the npc.java....)
so player.java --- inMulti means it will ONLY show the sign
npc.java --- inMulti means that the monsters in the inmulti will be attackable by others.
#durrr Moment

item.title: inMulti error (fixed can remove)
item.dc:creator: @popcorn57 popcorn57
item.description:
@popcorn57 wrote:

Thank you for replying, But when I walk into the area it shows I am in a multi combat area. and when I remove the coords in the player.java it will show that it isnt a multi area anymore so it is working but it just wont let me attack still for some reason.

Read full topic

item.title: inMulti error (fixed can remove)
item.dc:creator: @ohokay ohokay
item.description:
@ohokay wrote:

Perhaps you have the bounds of the area wrong or you’re adding it in the wrong place
